item.title: Aptugo develops customized web software without requiring any training
item.description:
Aptugo, a software tool designed to help individuals without coding experience build websites, is currently in beta testing. Developed by the company Aptugo, the software is expected to launch in 2015. “Aptugo has the potential to bridge the gap between large and small businesses. Users don’t need any programming knowledge to use it,” stated Gaston Gorosterrazu, Head of Aptugo. “However, those with coding experience can further enhance what Aptugo can do, as it is designed to empower users and expand their capabilities...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/aptugo-develops-customized-web-software-without-requiring-any-training/

item.title: A trial for FAST check-in has been introduced by Changi Airport, Singapore Airlines, and SilkAir
item.description:
A new Fast and Seamless Travel (FAST) check-in trial is currently underway at Changi Airport Terminal 2 for passengers flying with Singapore Airlines and SilkAir. This collaborative effort between Changi Airport Group (CAG), Singapore Airlines, and SilkAir will gradually introduce a comprehensive suite of FAST options throughout 2016. These options aim to provide passengers with more check-in choices and potentially faster processing times through automated kiosks and bag drops. Terminal 3 will also see the addition of 24 kiosks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-trial-for-fast-check-in-has-been-introduced-by-changi-airport-singapore-airlines-and-silkair/

item.title: Beogram 4000: Increasing Tonearm Lowering Delay
item.description:
After installing a new hood on a Beogram 4000 turntable, the author noticed the tonearm descended too quickly. Adjusting the damper’s screw didn’t solve the problem, as the tonearm still dropped rapidly despite the damper slowing down. Further inspection revealed the damper’s linkage was positioned very close to the damper plunger. This proximity meant the linkage moved immediately when the damper activated, even before the damper could build up enough vacuum to slow the tonearm’s descent effectively...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-increasing-tonearm-lowering-delay/

item.title: StarHub, offering the quickest 3G and 4G network in Singapore, introduces the World's Fastest Band
item.description:
StarHub, a telecommunications company, has unveiled the “World’s Fastest Band” to celebrate its recognition in OpenSignal’s Speed Awards 2018 for having Singapore’s fastest 4G and 3G speeds. OpenSignal, a global wireless coverage mapping specialist, awarded StarHub based on network quality. StarHub’s VP of Segment & Marketing, Donovan Kik, emphasized the company’s commitment to network quality and customer satisfaction. He stated their dedication to meeting customer needs and expectations despite achieving this recognition...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starhub-offering-the-quickest-3g-and-4g-network-in-singapore-introduces-the-world-s-fastest-band/
